## FieldImage.setOnClickHandler() method

Set the function that is called when this image is clicked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  func | ((p1: [FieldImage](./blockly.fieldimage_class.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; any) \| null | The function that is called when the image is clicked, or null to remove. |
